author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Big splash: The world's largest designer of water parks
description: Geoff Chutter is the founder of Whitewater West, the world's largest water park design firm.
content:
Media captionGeoff Chutter says that when hiring staff he looks for positivity rather than skills.
In 1980 Geoff Chutter found himself "mortgaged to the underside of the nostrils", and the owner of a brand new water park.
The then 28-year-old had no previou… [+6344 chars]
